casebody.data:
RESOURCE POINT, LLC, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
ADDOLUX, LLC, Defendant,
and
Masoud Abbasi, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158632
COA: 338338 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 16, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing his reply is GRANTED. The reply submitted on January 14, 2019, is accepted as timely filed.
